talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
Because of the size of the vibrations, there's a wide range of areas to look at. While we're checking the nightmare, why don't you examine the Silver Dragon's Forcefield?

※This quest cannot be carried out in a party.

$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
Of course, our Dragon must be keeping an eye on the place, but we need to determine the cause. If there's something as strange as before, we might need your power.

$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
Thank you. Take care!
<html>$Unexpected Encounter$</html>

$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
Thank you. Take care!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Trouble? That's not it! Anyway, what the heck is going on here?!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
(Velskud looks incredibly angry.)
Tell me! What trouble did you make this time?!

※This quest cannot be carried out in a party.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>How could I not see it? A massive new road sprang up out of nowhere!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
You came here without even knowing what happened?
(He seems to clench his teeth as if biting his tongue.)
It was a huge vibration that shook the whole barrier, and you didn't feel it? At least you recognize that the place has changed.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Rearranged… Is that what happened in <FONT color=#086171>Saint Haven</FONT>?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Yeah, exactly. Space has been totally rearranged.

$Velskud$
Of course there have been changes there too. Isn't that why you came to see me?

${user_nick}$
(You tell Velskud what Priestess of Darkness Shea said and about the changes in Saint Haven.)
His Majesty and I are the only ones who recognize the situation.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Well… I've been thinking that the changes are related to the Goddess's dream…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
I'm not surprised. That's how humans are.The things that surround them have changed completely, yet they don't even see it. They carry on as calmly as fish in a fishbowl.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But why has this happened in Saint Haven specifically?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Good. At least you have some brains. Lagendia can change at any time according to the Goddess's dreams. This time the change was so enormous that the entirety of space is shaking in the aftereffects. It's because the whole dream has moved.

$Velskud$
What is in Saint Haven?

$Velskud$
(Glares at you coldly)

$Velskud$
Yes. TheGarden of Time and Space is a place for collecting and monitoring the Goddess's nightmares. Of course, the place is greatly influenced by dreams.

$Velskud$
I'm sure you remember what the collapse was about, at least.

${user_nick}$
Because Labynia haphazardly fashioned and separated the fabric of space... The Goddess's nightmares are being created randomly?

$Velskud$
You've finally found a use for that tiny head of yours.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>No way, that's why this place has changed, too?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
The Garden of Time and Space, the Labyrinth, the Storm of Time and Space… Think about it.You humans think this place is safe, but Saint Haven is on the front line of the nightmare.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>There's nothing wrong with the barrier though, right?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Yeah. It's the same problem. Even if the barrier blocks the nightmare's energy from flowing into the open Monolith, the change in dreams is bound to appear most intensely here.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Oh, not at all! But with that amount of vibration... The Goddess is not going to wake up, right?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
… How dare you doubt my ability? You've become quite brave.

$Velskud$
Why, are you worried?

${user_nick}$
It's obvious! Don't we need the Cup of Healing to wake up the Goddess? Hold on… But if the Goddess wakes up, does what Feder said before come true? Our entire world will disappear! What the heck do we do?
(I can't think straight!)

$Velskud$
Stop making a fuss. I'm having enough trouble thinking about Labynia... Wait, what is that?

${user_nick}$
(All of a sudden, a whirlwind envelops {user_nick}'s body.)
... Huh? What? What is this?

$Velskud$
Grab my hand, you fool! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
Idiot! How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Gaharam${action:Talk}
... You...

$Gaharam$
How did you get caught up in this place, poor soul? I wish I could guide you, but I don't have the strength at the moment.

$Gaharam$
You are inside the Goddess's dream within a dream. It is a collection of fragments that cross between the Goddess' nightmares and dreams that have lost their place in reality. Fragments that don't have a place anywhere in time and space, they can flow adrift to any place at all and the things they may contain are limitless.

$Gaharam$
This is a place sages, prophets, and even powerful priestesses fear... It's a place you wouldn't even dare to explore carefully. Few people are safe here. Perhaps... a dragon might be a different story.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(So it's because of Rubinart's jewel.)</FONT> Gaharam, I…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Gaharam$
At first, I thought it you were just an unfortunate soul caught up in this... But I feel a powerful force inside you. It's the power of a jewel, but you are not a dragon. Just who or what are you?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Oh! Because this is a place where Time and Space intersect... we're... in a different era.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Gaharam$
… You know that name? You… Who are you? I… I am the sage Bishas Arnobius. Tell me your name, poor soul.

${user_nick}$
I… I'm {user_nick}. My name is {user_nick}.

$Gaharam$
That... That's an amazing coincidence. That name... that name...

$Gaharam$
!!!

$Gaharam$
Really... Of all the revelations I've seen... I saw your face, I knew your name, but... Like this... Aah!

$Gaharam$
The terrible things I've done... Those sins that can never be forgiven... Oh, God. I can't be happy, I don't deserve to be. Of all my sins, of all the fruits of my evil labor, this alone is so very beautiful. Sinner though I am...

${user_nick}$
Mother, I... I'm still fighting. I don't know how to use the power of the Shadow Prophet, but I'm still fighting for the world as much as I can.
In this world and, the other world.

$Gaharam$
Goddess... Goddess... Oh! I pray this is true... I pray this is not just another empty illusion of a dream within a dream you are showing this sinner, this manic who sealed her own fate.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(All of a sudden, a whirlwind envelops </FONT>{user_nick}<FONT color=#7e12d2>'s body.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Gaharam${action:Talk}
My daughter {user_nick}, I have something to say to you. You are…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Mother! What are you saying? What are you trying to tell me?!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Gaharam$
Oh… The Goddess is taking you. Oh, but I haven't been able to give you my message...

$Gaharam$
Goddess, is this all that you will permit me to say?

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Velskud$
Grab my hand, you fool! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
Idiot! How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(That person… I've seen them before in the Monolith. Beside </FONT><FONT color=#a82424>Lunaria</FONT><FONT color=#7e12d2>…)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Assassin Ren$
What the…? This is Old Saint Haven… Has the city changed again? Or… Have I traveled in time without you?

${user_nick}$
(Lunaria asked me to keep him as a friend and companion. She'll be relieved... I guess he's not a bad guy. People can change... Lunaria wasn't a bad person either.)

$Assassin Ren$
Why did this...? Why did she show up? Did she create another spatial realm?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I can't say I know her, but... I saw her when the Garden of Time and Space collapsed.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Assassin Ren${sound:npc_as_q3862_02.ogg}
…! I saw a woman in black before I came here. Labynia... She was creating new fabric in space. But you… Do you know Labynia too?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(In that case, this might be a </FONT><FONT color=#a82424>dream within a dream</FONT><FONT color=#7e12d2> too.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Assassin Ren$
… Me too. She called it a dream within a dream. And said she was swept here too. Then she disappeared after a moment.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Of course I'm a <FONT color=#a82424>real person</FONT>! I'm {user_nick}, in flesh in blood.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Assassin Ren${sound:npc_as_q3862_04.ogg}
Dream within a dream... What the heck has the Goddess done? I mean, what is she dreaming of? Are you a real person?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I understand. This place has thrown me for a loop too. The city has changed, and this is...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Assassin Ren$
My apologies. I'm Ren. I've been through a lot of strange things, and now I can't believe anything I see...

$Assassin Ren${sound:npc_as_q3862_01.ogg}
So you knew about that too! What is happening to Saint Haven? No, what the heck is happening to us? Why are we the only ones here?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Huh?! You're a Mistlander? Are you an enemy?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Assassin Ren${sound:npc_as_q3862_03.ogg}
Besides, that guy over there... was aware that Saint Haven had changed, despite being a Mistlander. Come to think of it, the only people here are those who know Saint Haven has changed.

$Assassin Ren$
The Mistlander didn't seem interested in fighting. You're a Lagendian, right?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Right, finding a way out is the priority.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Assassin Ren$
(Adopts a mysterious expression.)
Uh... Anyway, we have to find a way out of here. Labynia, dreams within dreams, Saint Haven... Something big is happening.

${user_nick}$
(It's amazing. I thought the dream within a dream was supposed to be dangerous... Yet somehow I feel safe here, and I think there's a reason. Maybe... maybe this is the Goddess's will.)

${user_nick}$
(This time it's different from Mobius. I feel like I'm where I should be, where I should have come. And I even feel warm and cozy.)

$Velskud$
Grab my hand, you fool! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
Idiot! How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Assassin Ren$
(He seems to be seriously mulling something over.)

$Vandar${sound:npc_van_q3871_01.ogg}
Ho-oh, why are you here? An adventurer from Lagendia. Well, I'm not an enemy, so you can relax.

$Vandar${action:Talk}
Yeah. I was having a nightmare and got caught up in this place. That cold Priestess of Darkness sent me to the Silver Dragon.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(If Velskud spared his life... It must be for a reason.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Vandar$
What? You sound like he should have killed me. He was quite harsh, but I have my own reasons for ending up here.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(I think this guy accidentally got involved in this, too.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Vandar${sound:npc_van_q3871_02.ogg}
You understand that I'm not a dangerous person now, right? I have no intention of causing you harm, so feel free to be straight with me. Where the heck are we, and how do we get out?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>This is… the Goddess's <FONT color=#a82424>dream within a dream</FONT>.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Vandar$
I completely lost my bearings after wandering between the realms of space.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It's not a joke. This is a kind of <FONT color=#a82424>fragment</FONT> of dreams that's completely broken off from Time and Space.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Vandar${sound:npc_van_q3871_05.ogg}
A world of dreams where you can touch things and into which you can be pulled... What a strange place.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>…! <FONT color=#7e12d2>(Right, come to think of... he's from Mistland… It's not a dream!)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Vandar${sound:npc_van_q3871_04.ogg}
Oh my, was I dragged here too? Is your Goddess so strong she can blend the two worlds?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You speak very loosely about the Goddess.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Vandar${sound:npc_van_q3871_03.ogg}
Anyway, so you're saying this is a world where the Goddess Lagendia can do whatever she wants, even in a dream or a dream within a dream. How do people live in such an unstable world?

$Vandar$
Oh, uh sorry. I meant no harm. You don't know how to get out of here either, do you? Why don't we work on it together?

${user_nick}$
(What am I feeling? Those eyes... Those eyes covered by an eyepatch remind me of something strangely unpleasant. It's like... it's like there's something there that shouldn't be. I think this is something my teacher taught me about.)

${user_nick}$
(A curse, one so very old that it has been forgotten by all. My teacher said that even though ordinary people are unable to recognize it, the villagers could feel it. But why this guy? He's definitely a Mistlander...
No, you have to think of a way out first. Concentrate on that for now.)

$Velskud$
Grab my hand, you fool! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
Idiot! How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Vandar$
(He seems to be thinking over something serious.)

$Velskud$
You troublemaker! What are you doing here!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Look, we didn't come here because we wanted to!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Quiet! You're lucky your very existence hasn't been eradicated, coming all the way here. You fools, go back to where you came from!

$Velskud$
(Velskud glares in your direction with terrifying eyes. It would be beneficial for your health not to say anything right now.)
Do you know where you are right now? You're in a dream within a dream. I couldn't hold onto you before, so you were swept all the way here!

$Velskud$
I thought you were an okay kid, but I guess I was mistaken. It must have been hard for that woman to clean up your messes all the time. (His mouth snaps shut and he seems to be holding back his anger.) Here, hold on tight.

$Velskud$
Unless you want to spend a thousand years here, grab my hand. You'll have to keep your wits about you to avoid being swept away.

$Velskud$
You must want to stay here for a thousand years. I won't stop you.

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Velskud$
Grab my hand, you fool! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
Idiot! How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(This place… is the </FONT><FONT color=#086171>Silver Dragon's Forcefield</FONT><FONT color=#7e12d2>…)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
...
<html>$Quest Complete$</html>

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅰ
journal.contents:
Go to the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

It's true that a huge transformation has occurred, but you don't know why, or how it has affected the rest of the world. Go to the Silver Dragon's Forcefield and find out what's going on.

Silver Dragon's Forcefield-Velskud
journal.todo_msg: Go to the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅱ
journal.contents:
Speak with Gaharam.
After falling into the cracks created by the distortions in Time and Space, you see her right in front of you. Talk to Gaharam.

Eye of the Goddess-Gaharam

※To get to Gaharam, you must first go to Velskud in the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅲ
journal.contents:
Speak with Assassin Ren.
You were swept up by another whirlwind before you could have a proper conversation with Gaharam. This time you were suddenly dropped into a new location. Will the whirlwind appear here too? Speak with the people here for now.

Old Saint Haven-Assassin Ren

※To get to Old Saint Haven, you must first go to Velskud in the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅳ
journal.contents:
Speak with Vandar.
You were swept up by another whirlwind before you could have a proper conversation with Gaharam. This time you were suddenly dropped into a new location. Will the whirlwind appear here too? Speak with the people here for now.

Old Saint Haven-Vandar

※To get to Old Saint Haven, you must first go to Velskud in the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅴ
journal.contents:
Speak with Velskud.
As you were speaking with the others and beginning to fall into the abyss of despair, Velskud appeared before you. Is he, like Gaharam, part of the Goddess's dream within a dream that appeared for but an instance? Speak with him and find out.

Old Saint Haven-Velskud

※To get to Old Saint Haven, you must first go to Velskud in the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅵ
journal.contents:
Speak with Velskud.

You escaped the Old Saint Haven, the dream within a dream. Velskud is looking your way silently. Talk to Velskud in the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

Silver Dragon's Forcefield-Velskud
